ImyaTweaks.Title: Change the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings per LvL.
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can Increase or Decrease the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Max Storage Capacity for all all LvL 0 Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot LvL 0 Buildings ( Mod default settings = 30 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Max Storage Capacity for all all LvL 1 Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot LvL 1 Buildings ( Mod default settings = 65 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Max Storage Capacity for all all LvL 2 Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot LvL 2 Buildings ( Mod default settings = 105 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Max Storage Capacity for all all LvL 3 Zanto Special Land Depot Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Max Storage Capacity of all Zanto Special Land Depot LvL 3 Buildings ( Mod default settings = 150 )
